info.title: To navigate to the source repositories for a project

procedure.step:
&CAWS-console-signin;
Make sure that you are navigating the project where you want to create or work with a source repository.

step.para: In the side navigation menu, choose Code, and then choose Source repositories.
Choose the name of the repository from the list of source repositories for the project. To create a source repository, choose Create repository.

tip.para: You can filter the list of repositories by typing part of the repository name in the filter bar.
